title: Posit Team User Training
text:
Workbench Features
This is a collection of courses that will help you get started with Posit Workbench.

title: Deploying a Shiny for Python Application to Posit Connect
Introduction to Posit Connect
text:
Posit Connect is a versatile platform for deploying everything you build in R and Python, equipping your business with vital insights for growth. Below are courses designed to help get started using Posit Connect.








  
    
    
    
      Job Scheduling
      How to schedule static content (Quarto, Jupyter Notebooks, and RMarkdown) to run on Posit Connect.
    
  

  
    
    
    
      Publishing Methods on Posit Connect
      How to publish content to Posit Connect.
    
  

  
    
    
    
      Runtime Settings
      Understand Runtime Settings on Posit Connect.

title: Deploying a Shiny for Python Application to Posit Connect
Deploying a Shiny for Python Application to Posit Connect
Posit Connect
text:
Background and Workbench Jobs



workbench


code execution


RStudio


VS Code



Learn how to run code in as a background or workbench job in Posit Workbench.


















Deploying a Dash Application to Posit Connect



connect


dash


python


cli publish


rsconnect-python


VS Code



This lesson will show you how to deploy a Dash application to Posit Connect using the CLI.


















Deploying a Shiny for Python Application to Posit Connect



connect


shiny-python


cli publish


rsconnect-python


VS Code



Learn how to deploy a Shiny for Python application to Posit Connect using the rsconnect-python command line interface.

connect


git


publish


CI/CD

RStudio


R


Python



Learn how to publish content to Posit Connect using Git Backed Deployment for both R and Python content.

code execution


automation


job scheduling

pins

publish


RStudio
